summary: The Slider class represents an interactive UI control that lets users select a numeric value within a defined range by dragging a thumb along a track. It maintains state such as current value, minimum and maximum limits, step divisions, visual styling (colors, thumb appearance), and emits events for focus, blur, and value changes, providing immediate visual feedback.
business_intent: Enable applications to capture user-adjusted numeric settings (e.g., volume, brightness, percentages) through a responsive, visually intuitive component that updates in real time and integrates with event handling for further processing.
